program: Master of Science in Mechanical Engineering (MS)

sections.text: Caltechâ€™s ME MS provides foundational and elective coursework in mechanical engineering, typically completed within the first two years of residency.

items: Minimum 138 units of courses numbered 100+ (grade C or higher)
Math/engineering/research electives (54 units; up to 27 units of ME 300 research)
sections.text: Students complete required ME core and approved electives to meet unit requirements; research units may count within specified limits.
